channel.title: Making new sprites on a client?
channel.description:
I am working on a new client and server, and I don't really like the sprites I have. To change say, the compass, would I only need to make one new sprite? Also, what do I make sprites with, seeing as they are saved in a file format windows can't find a program for... .jag
Any help is appreciated ;)

item.title: Making new sprites on a client?
item.dc:creator: @DDT DDT
item.description:
@DDT wrote:

I don’t have any capable program to do that, and when Microsoft looks online, it can’t find a program…

Read full topic
